Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm
Deprecated: ShowHide

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDrmInitData
    Encapsulates initialization data required by a MediaDrm instances.
    ILicenseManager
    Interface to the License Manager.
    IVirtuosoDrmSession<T extends android.media.MediaCrypto>
    Manages a DRM session.
    VirtuosoDrmSessionManager.EventListener
    Listener of VirtuosoDrmSessionManager events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IDrmInitData.Mapped
    A IDrmInitData implementation that maps UUID onto scheme specific data.
    IDrmInitData.SchemeInitData
    Scheme initialization data.
    IDrmInitData.Universal
    A IDrmInitData implementation that returns the same initialization data for all schemes.
    KeySessionData
     
    KeySetId
     
    LicenseManager
    Default implementation of the ILicenseManager interface.
    SessionId
     
    UUIDS
    Drm Scheme UUID Constants
    VirtuosoDrmSession
     
    VirtuosoDrmSessionManager
    Manages a DRM session, retrieving stored keys for offline viewing or retrieving keys whilst online.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KeysExpiredException
    Thrown when the drm keys loaded into an open session expire.
    NotImplementedException
    Exception thrown when a required implementation has not been provided.
    UnsupportedDrmException
    Thrown when the requested DRM scheme is not supported.
